## cdpctl check

check service

### Synopsis

check service'

```
cdpctl check [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  check service ServiceID ServiceID
  check service -g GroupName
```

### Options

```
  -g, --group string   check all services under given group-name.
  -h, --help           help for check
```
